data.lyric:
[ti:Fearless]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Platinum Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Fearless (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:06.78]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Liz Rose/Hillary Lindsey
[00:13.56]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Liz Rose/Hillary Lindsey
[00:20.35]There's something 'bout the way the street looks when it's just rained
[00:25.46]There's a glow off the pavement you walk me to the car
[00:30.26]And you know I wanna ask you to dance right there
[00:35.01]In the middle of the parking lot yeah
[00:43.41]Oh yeah
[00:49.20]We're driving down the road I wonder if you know
[00:53.98]I'm trying so hard not to get caught up now
[00:58.77]But you're just so cool run your hands through your hair
[01:03.85]Absent-mindedly making me want you
[01:08.51]And I don't know how it gets better than this
[01:13.16]You take my hand and drag me head first fearless
[01:17.89]And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[01:23.11]In a storm in my best dress fearless
[01:37.17]So baby drive slow 'til we run out of road in this one horse town
[01:44.36]I wanna stay right here in this passenger's seat
[01:49.25]You put your eyes on me
[01:51.91]In this moment now capture it remember it
[01:56.38]'Cause I don't know how it gets better than this
[02:01.13]You take my hand and drag me head first fearless
[02:06.03]And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[02:11.20]In a storm in my best dress fearless
[02:34.98]Well you stood there with me in the doorway
[02:38.63]My hands shake I'm not usually this way but
[02:44.37]You pull me in and I'm a little more brave
[02:48.03]It's the first kiss it's flawless really something
[02:54.57]It's fearless
[03:00.19]Oh yeah
[03:06.01]'Cause I don't know how it gets better than this
[03:10.99]You take my hand and drag me head first fearless
[03:15.59]And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[03:20.70]In a storm in my best dress fearless
[03:25.15]'Cause I don't know how it gets better than this
[03:30.01]You take my hand and drag me head first fearless
[03:34.80]And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[03:39.87]In a storm in my best dress fearless
[03:45.89]Oh oh
[03:48.38]Oh yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Fearless]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Platinum Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.78]//
[00:13.56]//
[00:20.35]周边的空气弥漫着别样的气息 小路像是刚接受过大雨的洗礼
[00:25.46]人行道上 映射出微光 你与我 漫步到车前
[00:30.26]此时此刻 只想邀你共舞一曲
[00:35.01]就在这 宽绰的停车场中央
[00:43.41]//
[00:49.20]沿着小道 缓缓驶过 不知你是否察觉
[00:53.98]我用尽全力 不被你迷住
[00:58.77]可你时刻散发魅力 轻撩头发的小小举动
[01:03.85]已让我神魂颠倒 为你沦陷
[01:08.51]世上最美妙的事莫过于
[01:13.16]你拉起我的手 不顾一切 勇往直前
[01:17.89]不知为何 但与你一起 我能勇敢起舞
[01:23.11]身穿最美的裙子 即便狂风骤雨 无所畏惧
[01:37.17]到达目的地之前 请开慢一点 途径安逸的乡村小镇
[01:44.36]静享与你相处的时光 此刻副驾驶座上的我
[01:49.25]正对上你炙热的目光
[01:51.91]希望时光就此停驻 定格此刻 用心铭记
[01:56.38]世上最美妙的事莫过于
[02:01.13]你拉起我的手 不顾一切 勇往直前
[02:06.03]不知为何 但与你一起 我能勇敢起舞
[02:11.20]身穿最美的裙子 即便狂风骤雨 无所畏惧
[02:34.98]而现在 你就站在我的面前
[02:38.63]手心颤抖 以往的淡定自如不再
[02:44.37]但你拥我入怀 给予我勇气
[02:48.03]完美的初吻 让人无需畏惧 放手去爱
[02:54.57]勇往直前
[03:00.19]//
[03:06.01]世上最美妙的事莫过于
[03:10.99]你拉起我的手 不顾一切 勇往直前
[03:15.59]不知为何 但与你一起 我能勇敢起舞
[03:20.70]身穿最美的裙子 即便狂风骤雨 无所畏惧
[03:25.15]世上最美妙的事莫过于
[03:30.01]你拉起我的手 不顾一切 勇往直前
[03:34.80]不知为何 但与你一起 我能勇敢起舞
[03:39.87]身穿最美的裙子 即便狂风骤雨 无所畏惧
[03:45.89]//
[03:48.38]//
